name: Christmas Night Archery
synopsis: Test your skills and play this Christmas themed archery game. You can choose from 2 game modes with 3 variants. In Classic mode your task is to reach the highscore with 10 arrows from 5,10 or 15 meters. In the arcade mode you have 30,45 or 60 seconds to beat your highest score. Do you have what it takes to be the best archer?
